thing-type.label: Subnet Scan
thing-type.description: Subnet scan for alive hosts and optionally for open ports.

parameter.name: nmap
parameter.label: nmap bin location
parameter.description: Path to nmap binary must be provided, e.g. /bin/nmap

parameter.name: subnet
parameter.label: Subnet
parameter.description: Subnet which shall be scanned e.g. 192.168.192.0/24 or 192.168.192.1-100

parameter.name: ports
parameter.label: Scan Ports
parameter.description: Switch to activate scan for open ports.

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Interval the subnet is scanned in minutes. Depending on number of hosts in the subnet, interval has to be increased.

channel-type.label: Hosts
channel-type.description: Number of alive hosts found in subnet scan

channel-type.label: Host Names
channel-type.description: Comma seperated list of names of hosts found in the subnet (undef for hosts without name)

channel-type.label: Host Addresses
channel-type.description: Comma seperated list of IPv4 addresses of the hosts found in the subnet

channel-type.label: Host Ports
channel-type.description: Semicolon seperated list of comma separated lists of open ports of the hosts found in the subnet (undef for hosts without name)
